Class AddDeliveryPointCommand

java.lang.Object
com.pld.agile.controller.AddDeliveryPointCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class AddDeliveryPointCommand extends Object implements Command
The AddDeliveryPointCommand class implements the Command interface and provides functionality to add a delivery point to a specific round. It also supports undoing the addition of a delivery point.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    execute()
    Executes the command by adding a delivery point to the round and updating the delivery tours accordingly.
    Round
    getRound()
    Retrieves the Round associated with this command.
    List<DeliveryTour>
    getUpdatedTours()
    Retrieves the updated delivery tours after the execution of this command.
    void
    undo()
    Undoes the command by removing the added delivery point from the round and reverting the delivery tours to their previous state.

  • Constructor Details

    • AddDeliveryPointCommand

      public AddDeliveryPointCommand(Round round, String intersectionId, Integer courierId)
      Constructs an AddDeliveryPointCommand with the specified round, intersection ID, and courier ID.
      Parameters:
      round - The Round object where the delivery point will be added.
      intersectionId - The ID of the intersection to add as a delivery point.
      courierId - The ID of the courier to update the delivery tours, or -1 if no courier is specified.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Executes the command by adding a delivery point to the round and updating the delivery tours accordingly.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface Command

    • undo

      public void undo()
      Undoes the command by removing the added delivery point from the round and reverting the delivery tours to their previous state.
      Specified by:
      undo in interface Command

    • getRound

      public Round getRound()
      Retrieves the Round associated with this command.
      Specified by:
      getRound in interface Command
      Returns:
      The Round object.

    • getUpdatedTours

      public List<DeliveryTour> getUpdatedTours()
      Retrieves the updated delivery tours after the execution of this command.
      Returns:
      A list of DeliveryTour objects representing the updated tours.
